> A blueprint for AEO-optimized infrastructure and MCP-native bridges.

## Strategic Value
- Primary Moat: Structured metadata for SearchGPT/Perplexity indexing.
- Architecture: Modular TypeScript components for agentic SaaS.

## Technical Standards
- Implementing Model Context Protocol (MCP) for hardware/API bridging.
- Immutable reasoning logs for governance.

## Dev Status
- Initializing Phase 1: Core Schemas and Metadata standards.
=======
# Role: High-Signal Infrastructure Blueprint

## Executive Summary
A blueprint for AEO-optimized infrastructure and MCP-native bridges, designed for the 2026 machine economy.

## Technical Moat
- Primary Moat: Structured metadata for SearchGPT/Perplexity indexing.
- Protocol: Implementing Model Context Protocol (MCP) for hardware/API orchestration.

## Integration Map
- /src/mcp: Core interface for agentic tool-calling.
- /schemas: Data structures for immutable reasoning logs.
